item.title: Workers' Compensation Estimator
item.description: Created a tool that estimates workers compensation claims(MSE~$30k)to help company predict future claims Engineered features from text to help determine specific types of injuries Optimized Linear Lasso, Randon Forest Regressors and XgBoost using GridSearch CV SUMMARY & INSIGHTS The project task involved analyzing workersâ€™ compensation data. As with most insurance-related data, the distribution of past claims in the training set was highly skewed with a max claim of 3.
